availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James W. Bradshaw (Simpson County, Kentucky, merchant and Simpson County Assessor )

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, merchant and Simpson County Tax Assessor. Kentucky native. Son of William Bradshaw and N. Bradshaw. Father of Samuel Bradshaw. Laborer in Simpson County, Kentucky in 1850. Named postmaster in Simpson County, Kentucky on September 8, 1858. Merchant in Franklin, Kentucky in 1860. Nominated to the Office of Assessor in Simpson County, Kentucky by Provisional Government of Kentucky on December 29, 1861.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p.123.Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, Franklin, p. 405. KYR-0004-033-0038.
